sen.j: 屠蘇（とそ）とは、一年間の邪気を払い長寿を願って正月に呑む薬酒である。
sen.e: Toso is medicinal alcoholic beverages which people drink on the New Year's Day in hope of being free from noxious bad vibes that cause illness and other misfortunes during a coming year as well as their longevity.

sen.e: As shown by the old saying " A family will be free from illness if a person drink it and people residing within 4km will be free from illness if all people in a family drink it", it is indispensible for celebrating New Year.
